messages.subject: Happy Ikedaya Day + Request Assistance
messages.msgSnippet: This seems to be a festival float depicting Ikedaya??? Note man on the stairs...how many Shinsengumi films have you seen with a guy falling down the stairs
messages.messageBody:
This seems to be a festival float depicting Ikedaya??? Note man on the
stairs...how many Shinsengumi films have you seen with a guy falling
down the stairs during the raid?
http://www45.tok2.com/home/todo94/photogallery/tabisaki/town/town-kyushu/kazariyamakasa-shinsengumi.jpg

http://www.shinsengumihq.com needs YOUR help
all contributors will be noted on the page ofcourse
*Rough* Draft
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/shinsentimeline.htm
the final draft which will appear on the website will have (2) views
1) strictly Shinsengumi info
2) national/political timeline so visitors can see how the Shinsengumi
fit in with everything going on during those years

I made the rough draft a really long time ago
(ALL YEARS ARE ACCORDING TO THE WESTERN CALENDAR--as far as I know)
---there may be mistakes, if you find them or would like to contribute
(we seriously need some SAtsuma, Choshu and Tosa info) please contact
secretarytocapt3(a)hotmail.com

http://www.shinsengumimb.com (along with all other EZBOARD
messageboards) was recently damaged and has not yet been restored--so
I had to post this timeline here---again please contact me {off-list}
to help with this mini project

Thanks
